sent.orig: Cherish all kinds of facility and make sure the communication facility in sound running with neatness.
sent.trans: 爱护各类设备，保证通讯设备整洁、畅通，维护其正常工作。

sent.orig: Polyester: steel and iron manufacturing facility, cement facility, excellent strength, high resistance against abrasion.
sent.trans: 涤纶：钢铁制造设备，水泥设备，具有高强度，强耐磨性。

sent.orig: Responsible for plant facility and building maintenance and management, Push PM system in facility daily work.
sent.trans: 负责公司设施及建筑的维护及管理，推动预检修系统在日常设施管理中的应用。

sent.orig: If animals are housed in other facility, describe the facility where animals will be housed.
sent.trans: 如动物饲养于动物中心外，请说明饲养场所之设备与饲养管理措施。

sent.orig: Charlie Rogan, a facility employee, approaches with news of the facility's only truck breaking down again.
sent.trans: CharlieRogan,一个肥料地的员工，过来说肥料地唯一的一辆卡车坏了。
